name: surix-tools
description: A service that helps developers intereact with surix data from the apps they develop

scripts.local:build: yarn clean && tsc --outDir local/build/dist && tsc -m es6 --outDir local/build/dist-esm && node_modules/.bin/webpack --output-path $PWD/local/dist --mode development
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir build/dist-esm && node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production

author: Kevin Nderitu
